table.style: background-color: white; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0px; border: 0px; color: black; font-family: Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; height: 127px; line-height: 15px; margin-bottom: 0px; width: 100%;

td.style: border: 1px solid rgb(242, 242, 242); font-weight: bold; line-height: 24px; padding: 0px 15px; vertical-align: top;

th.style: background-color: #fafafa; border: 1px solid rgb(242, 242, 242); font-weight: normal; line-height: 24px; padding: 0px 15px;
